title: Set Up Notes
text:
Notes

# at the time of writing the stable release is 1.3.450
# Quarto beta install 
quarto -v 

1.4.489



# use clean install of conda on machine in private space 
source /Users/sw/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh
conda -V
# e.g. add a channel 
# conda config --add channels bioconda 
conda config --show channels 
# bacterial-genomics-tutorial-sw5 is the most complete
# quast causes issues with the full environment  
conda env list

conda 24.1.2
channels:
  - bioconda
  - conda-forge
  - defaults
# conda environments:
#
base                  *  /Users/sw/anaconda3
bacterial-genomics-tutorial-sw1     /Users/sw/anaconda3/envs/bacterial-genomics-tutorial-sw1
bacterial-genomics-tutorial-sw2     /Users/sw/anaconda3/envs/bacterial-genomics-tutorial-sw2
bacterial-genomics-tutorial-sw3     /Users/sw/anaconda3/envs/bacterial-genomics-tutorial-sw3
bacterial-genomics-tutorial-sw4     /Users/sw/anaconda3/envs/bacterial-genomics-tutorial-sw4
bacterial-genomics-tutorial-sw5     /Users/sw/anaconda3/envs/bacterial-genomics-tutorial-sw5
example                  /Users/sw/anaconda3/envs/example

title: Set Up Notes
text:
Conda commands
Some examples for future reference and documentation of the limited environment.
quast causes issues
e.g. create an env

# conda create --name example
# conda install jupyterlab
# conda activate example
# conda list \| grep jupyter

# run for example jupyterlab

# jupyter-lab

# conda deactivate

# conda env create -f environment.yaml

# Found conflicts! Looking for incompatible packages.

# now a series of reduced env for testing and debugging

# conda env create -f environment_sw1.yaml

# conda env create -f environment_sw2.yaml

# conda env create -f environment_sw4.yaml

# conda env create -f environment_sw3.yaml

# conda env create -f environment_sw5.yaml

# Adding 'quast' causes issues

# ... Solving environment: failed ..

# conda env create -f environment_sw6.yaml

# to remove an environment

# conda remove --name bacterial-genomics-tutorial-sw5-sw1 --all

title: Set Up Notes
text:
Strange bug

# R test - a good rational approximation to a math joke
message(paste0("Rough Pie: ", 355/113, "\n",
               " Real Pi : ", pi))

Rough Pie: 3.14159292035398
 Real Pi : 3.14159265358979

# And the bizarre thing is, if I remove this joke block
# the bash above does not execute
# go figure!! makes no sense

title: WGS Bacteria
text:

Using Anaconda (conda and miniconda)
